Package com.sri.ai.grinder.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Constraint
    An Expression with efficient internal representation for satisfiability.
    Context
    A Context combines a Registry and a Constraint in order to provide a context for SGDPLL(T)-related methods.
    ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver
    An indicator interface for ExpressionStepSolvers that only split on the context using literals (i.e.
    ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver.Step  
    ExpressionStepSolver
    A StepSolver specialized for problems with Expression-typed solutions.
    ExpressionStepSolver.Step  
    LiteralSplitterStepSolver<T>
    A specialization of the StepSolver interface that indicates splitting only ever occurs using literals and not general formulas.
    LiteralSplitterStepSolver.Step<T>  
    MultiQuantifierEliminationProblem  
    MultiQuantifierEliminator
    Interface to classes able to eliminate quantification (for a fixed group) over given indices, constraint and body.
    Registry
    An object containing information about global symbols and their types, user-defined global objects, and a predicate for defining constants.
    SingleQuantifierEliminationProblem  
    SingleVariableConstraint
    An Expression with efficient internal representation for incrementally deciding satisfiability of a boolean formulas on literals in a certain theory.
    StepSolver<T>
    An interface for step-solvers for problems involving free variables constrained by a contextual Constraint.
    StepSolver.Step<T>
    A solver step of a StepSolver.
    Theory
    An interface for theories.
